fr.sii.ogham.core.translator.content

Class EveryContentTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.translator.content.EveryContentTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentTranslator

    public class EveryContentTranslator
extends Object
implements ContentTranslator
    Decorator that loop through all delegate translators to transform the content of the message. Every translator will be called to update the content. Each translator receive the content that may be updated by the previous translator.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
